TopicTitle: The Feller Empire fighting against The Terran Empire (pass the save war game)

Articles.Content:
so I started a war game with littlecheese999

to go to his thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/48802-The-Terran-Empire%28littlecheese999%29-VS-Feller-Empire-%28fascka%29

the rules are simple:

1. only 1 thing per "turn"

*building a ship and putting it into a orbit(but not to a moon or planet) is 1 turn

*rendezvous with a ship and docking/attacking it is a turn

*extending or descending a orbit(and if wanted make it circle) is a turn

*changing to a other planet/moons orbit(properly not just intercepting i.e so you can make ur orbit circle if wanted) is a turn

*landing is a turn

2. if your attacking a ship you can use 1 shot

3. cant edit other players ships, or control them (cmon be fair )

4. must name ship with empire name at front, feel free to be creative( something normal though, so dont call it D**k or something)

5. dont import ships, make them ur self

NO MODS

so here I will be telling about my progress along the game:

Turn 1:

I designed a little explorer (the T-1 Explorer) with a total Dv of 3000ms aprox in it`s final stage, it is equiped with two missiles

launchpad:

doing the gravity turn:

in orbit:

since this was the first ship there is not much to show but expect more things to come

Turn 2 and 3:

the idea of this turn was to take ot the principal force of the Evil Terran Empire "The Titan", "The Titan" is the strongest (we suppose) ship they have we don`t know how much missiles it has, or how powerfull it is but we must take it out

I forgot to take images during the launch, so here it is the interceptor missile:

Trying to rendevous, the orbit of "The Titan" was higher from what I was expecting,a regular 100x100km orbit instead it was a 150x150km orbit

Because the orbit was higher I wasted too much fuel doing the manuvers so I fired the missile early (because i ran out of fuel)

Since the target wasn`t in the ideal target distance 2km aprox we miss and we will have to wait another chance to attack

TURN 4:

So we launched our first ship that isn`t intended to fight (it has some missiles for personal protection)

And do you remember our little T-1 explorer??

well this little badboy will go and attack the "Stingray" (I think it is called)

So after doing normal rendevous manuvers we have our first visual contact:

So we engage for combat and prepare our first missile:

After deploying the communication antenas we fire the missile

AND IT`S A HIT!

Although it doesn`t seems that we have produced lots of damage

TURN 5 (this turn is not very exciting)

We engage the ammo carrier with the T-1 Explorer

And we fire the missile!

I`t seems that the ship is badly damaged and it`s a victory for the glorious Feller Empire

Edited September 9, 2013 by fascka
